menu.name: Modifiers
menu.desc: Modifiers to spice up the game!

menu.name: Scroll Speed
menu.desc: Options for the Scroll Speed modifier!

number.name: Set Scroll Speed
number.desc: Set the scroll speed! (Min: 0.1, Max: 10) (Requires Custom Scroll Speed enabled)

menu.name: Health Drain
menu.desc: Options for the Health Drain modifier! Health will get drained down as time goes on.

checkbox.name: Health Drain
checkbox.desc: Enables health drain. Your health will drain down overtime

menu.name: Poison
menu.desc: Options for the poison modifier! When you miss a note, you get poisoned for a temperoary time.

number.name: Multiplier
number.desc: Multiplier for the amount poison you get when missing a note.

number.name: Timer
number.desc: Amount of time for the poison lasting.

menu.name: Earthquake
menu.desc: Options for the Earthquake modifier! It will shake your screen endlessly

number.name: Playback Rate
number.desc: Change the playback rate! The higher, the faster the song will go by.

checkbox.name: Instant Death on Miss
checkbox.desc: If checked, missing a note will instantly kill you.

checkbox.name: Practice Mode
checkbox.desc: If checked, you cannot die no matter what.

checkbox.name: Botplay
checkbox.desc: If checked, a cpu will play the game for you!
